tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE water_usage_tracking (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    water_usage FLOAT,
    location VARCHAR,
    leak_identified BOOL
)

CREATE TABLE LeakDetection (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_id INT NOT NULL,
  date DATE NOT NULL,
  time TIME NOT NULL,
  leak_status BOOLEAN NOT NULL,
  volume_leaked FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE WaterUsage (
  usage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  usage_date DATE,
  usage_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
  CONSTRAINT fk_user_id FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES User(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE LeakDetection (
  leak_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  usage_id INT,
  detection_date DATE,
  detection_method VARCHAR(100),
  CONSTRAINT fk_usage_id FOREIGN KEY (usage_id) REFERENCES WaterUsage(usage_id)
);

CREATE TABLE LeakDetection (
    detection_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    date_detected DATE NOT NULL,
    type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    severity VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
);
